remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: We have identified a discrepancy in the net amount for the dividend associated with ISIN KR7005930003. The custody amount reported is ₩7,220,000, while the NBIM amount is ₩6,769,950, resulting in a difference of ₩450,050. Please review the calculations and provide clarification or correction as necessary.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: There is a discrepancy in the tax amount for the dividend related to ISIN KR7005930003. The custody tax reported is ₩1,805,000, while the NBIM tax is ₩1,985,500, resulting in a difference of ₩180,500. Please review this matter and provide the necessary corrections.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: We have noted a difference in the payment dates for the dividend associated with ISIN KR7005930003. The custody date is reported as May 25, 2025, while the NBIM date is May 20, 2025. Please provide clarification on the correct payment date.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: Internal review required for nominal mismatch identified for ISIN CH0038863350. The custody value is reported as CHF 30,000, while the NBIM value is CHF 15,000, resulting in a difference of CHF 15,000. This discrepancy appears to reflect an internal processing error.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: We have encountered a discrepancy regarding the gross amount for ISIN CH0038863350. The reported ex-date of April 25, 2025, does not align with the official ex-date of April 22, 2025. Please provide clarification on this matter as it remains unclear whether this reflects an internal error or a market practice.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: There is a discrepancy in the payment date for the dividend associated with ISIN CH0038863350. The custody pay date is reported as April 24, 2025, while the NBIM pay date is April 29, 2025. Please clarify the correct payment date.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: We have identified a tax-related break for ISIN CH0038863350. The reported ex-date of April 25, 2025, does not align with the standard market schedule of April 22, 2025. Please provide clarification regarding this discrepancy.
